preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out the Bismuth Oxide (140 g) and Antimony Trioxide (80 g) using an analytical balance. 
 2. Measure Selenium Powder (40 g) and add it to the metal oxides. 
 3. In a separate container, mix the ceramic binder (10 g) with distilled water (50 g) to form a slurry. 
 4. Gradually add the slurry to the mixed powders while stirring continuously until a homogeneous paste is formed.
